name: MedMe Health
headline: Software for pharmacies to move beyond dispensing
description:
MedMe Health builds software for pharmacists to deliver paid clinical services like prescribing/adapting medications, point-of-care testing, giving vaccinations, and monitoring chronic conditions.  

Our web-based platform helps both independent pharmacies and large chains schedule appointments online, conduct virtual care, automate documentation, and flag clinical opportunities. With MedMe, our customers have increased their efficiency of clinical service delivery by 10x and increased pharmacy revenue with the same staff.

For the first time, MedMe enables integrations to traditionally locally-stored pharmacy data. Our vision is to transform today’s dispensing locations to tomorrow’s health hubs.

founders.name: Nicholas Hui, Founder
founders.description: Mechanical Engineer with experiences in manufacturing at Tesla, John-Deere, and Nestle. Currently building MedMe Health as Chief Product Officer to help pharmacies become healthcare hubs.

generated_description:
**MedMe Health: Transforming Pharmacy Services**

Founded in 2019 and nestled in Toronto, Canada, MedMe Health is on a mission to revolutionize the pharmacy sector. They’ve created cutting-edge software that empowers pharmacies—both independent and large chains—to expand beyond traditional dispensing roles. The objective? To facilitate paid clinical services like medication management, point-of-care testing, vaccinations, and chronic disease monitoring.

With their innovative web-based platform, pharmacies can schedule appointments online, conduct virtual consultations, streamline documentation, and capture clinical opportunities. This isn’t just a nice-to-have; it’s a game changer. In fact, users have reported a tenfold increase in the efficiency of clinical service delivery, all while maintaining their current staffing levels. This means that pharmacies can increase revenues without the added burden of hiring more staff.

A notable aspect of MedMe’s offering is their ability to integrate with pharmacy data that has traditionally been locked away on local systems. Their vision is ambitious yet straightforward: to transform today’s dispensing locations into tomorrow’s health hubs, ensuring that pharmacies become indispensable parts of community healthcare.

MedMe Health is a member of Y Combinator's Batch W21, which gives it significant credibility in the startup ecosystem. The team comprises around 30 employees, and they’ve tapped into expertise from various fields under the guidance of their Group Partner, Nan.

You can explore their services and learn more about their vision on their website, [MedMe Health](https://www.medmehealth.com). In a world where healthcare technology is evolving rapidly, MedMe Health is at the forefront, crafting solutions that not only meet the current needs of pharmacies but also pave the way for future innovations in healthcare delivery.
